name: Homeseek-Inspired Choose Your Own Adventure
description:
Homeseek is a post-apocalyptic RTS game set on a dystopian, resource-strapped Earth. Can YOU survive in in a world where water has become the new gold and every choice becomes life or death?

In Homeseek, you must carefully manage your community and the scares resources available to you. You also embark on expeditions, which are full of risks and dangers but can provide life-saving rewards, such as resources as well as knowledge of new technologies and laws that you can bring with you as your colony moves in search of a sustainable place to call home. On these expeditions, you face hard choices that determine your failure or success as you travel.

In this choose-your-own-adventure inspired by Homeseek’s difficult decisions, you can get a taste of the harsh world you explore and conquer within the game.

Follow the development of Homeseek at @HomeseekGame and @TrapticsGames on Twitter, and be sure to wishlist Homeseek on Steam!
